pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, April 30, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the third floor foyer of West Block as of 12:00 p.m.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an armchair discussion with Director of Canadian Affairs for Canadaâ€™s Building Trade Unions (CBTU) Arlene Dunn at the 2019 CBTU Legislative Conference. Minister of Employment, Workforce Development and Labour Patty Hajdu will be in attendance.

Confederation Ballroom
The Westin Ottawa
11 Colonel By Drive

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:30 p.m.
